auth-method.help: Select certificate or pre-shared key authentication for this authentication group.
auth-method.name: auth-method

cert.help: Name of certificate to identify this peer.
cert.name: cert

peer.help: If peer-accept is set to one, select the name of one peer to add to this authentication group. The peer must have added with the wanopt peer command.
peer.name: peer

peer-accept.help: Determine if this auth group accepts, any peer, a list of defined peers, or just one peer.
peer-accept.name: peer-accept

options.help: Accept any peer that can authenticate with this auth group.
options.name: any

options.help: Accept only the peers added with the wanopt peer command.
options.name: defined

options.help: Accept the peer added to this auth group using the peer option.
options.name: one

psk.help: Pre-shared key used by the peers in this authentication group.
psk.name: psk
